amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $3 million from the Office of the Special Trustee to the Office of Navajo-Hopi Indian Relocation.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in House Report 115-830 to move $3,000,000 from the Office of the Special Trustee to the Office of Navajo-Hopi Indian Relocation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 196 (Roll no. 343).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the O'Halleran amendment (A025) Agreed to by recorded vote: 217 - 196 (Roll no. 343).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. O'Halleran.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
